item_amount,
item_capital_pool,
service_times,
advance_flag, surplus_amount, type, create_by, create_date )VALUES( #{orderId}, #{goodsMappingId}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderBalance}, #{orderArrearage}, #{appTotalAmount}, #{appArrearage},
#{itemAmount},

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(total_amount) as totalAmount, SUM(order_balance) as orderBalance, SUM(order_arrearage) as orderArrearage FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE order_id = #{orderid}
SELECT SUM(surplus_amount) AS 'surplusAmount' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND goods_mapping_id = #{goodsMappingId}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid} AND advance_flag = '1') AS 'advanceFlag', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid} AND advance_flag = '0' AND service_times = -1) AS 'sumAppt', (SELECT SUM(order_balance) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid}) AS 'goodsBalance', (SELECT SUM(surplus_amount) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid}) AS 'suitCardBalance', SUM(total_amount) as totalAmount, SUM(order_balance) as orderBalance, SUM(order_arrearage) as orderArrearage, SUM(service_times) AS remaintimes FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid}

SELECT d.order_id as orderId, d.goods_mapping_id as goodsMappingId, d.total_amount as totalAmount, d.order_balance as orderBalance, d.order_arrearage as orderArrearage, d.item_amount as itemAmount, d.item_capital_pool as itemCapitalPool, d.service_times as serviceTimes, d.create_by as "createBy.id", u.`name` as createByName, d.create_date as createDate, d.surplus_amount as surplusAmount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.create_by = u.id WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{recid}

SELECT a.rec_id, a.single_reality_price, a.goods_num, a.order_amount, a.total_amount, (a.order_amount - SUM(c.total_amount)) AS "isFre", SUM(c.total_amount) AS "detaiAmount", SUM(c.service_times) as "times"
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details c ON c.goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id WHERE a.rec_id =#{recId} GROUP BY a.rec_id
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details SET advance_flag = '0' WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{recid}
mapper.select: SELECT ao.shop_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details ogd LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ao ON ao.id = ogd.appt_id WHERE ogd.goods_mapping_id = #{goodsMappingId} AND ogd.service_times = -1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office_account_log ( order_id, office_id, type, office_from, amount, channel_flag, create_by, create_date )VALUES( #{orderId}, #{officeId}, #{type}, #{officeFrom}, #{amount}, 'bm', #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT ( CASE WHEN (SELECT appt_status FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE id = (SELECT appt_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{recId} AND advance_flag = '0' AND service_times = -1)) IN (1,2,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS num

SELECT SUM(ogd.order_balance) AS 'orderBalance', SUM(ogd.app_total_amount) AS 'appTotalAmount', SUM(ogd.app_arrearage) AS 'appArrearage', SUM(ogd.order_arrearage) AS 'sumOrderArrearage', ogm.goods_price AS 'goodsPrice', ogm.order_amount AS 'orderAmount', ogm.integral AS 'integral' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details ogd LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ogm ON ogm.rec_id = ogd.goods_mapping_id WHERE ogd.goods_mapping_id = #{recid}
